{{also|MIT|MİT|mít|mît|mīt|mit-}} ==Abinomn== ===Pronoun=== {{head|bsa|pronoun}} # [[I]] ---- ==Danish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|da|/mit/|[mid̥]}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|da|pronoun}} # {{lb|da|possessive}} {{neuter singular of|da|min}} ====See also==== {{Danish personal pronouns}} ---- ==French== ===Pronunciation=== * {{fr-IPA|pos=v}} * {{audio|fr|LL-Q150 (fra)-Pamputt-mit.wav|Audio}} * {{homophones|fr|mi|mie|mies|mis|mît}} ===Verb=== {{head|fr|verb form}} # {{inflection of|fr|mettre||3|s|phis}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|miti}}, {{m|goh|mit}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*midi}}. Cognate with {{cog|nds-de|[[met]], [[mihe-]] (separable part of verbs) {{q|Paderbornisch}}}} and the obsolete sense of {{cog|en|mid||with}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/mɪt/}} * {{audio|de|De-mit.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|ɪt}} ===Preposition=== {{head|de|preposition}} {{tlb|de|takes dative}} # [[with]] {{gloss|in the company of; alongside}} #: {{ux|de|Ich spiele '''mit''' meinen Freunden.|I'm playing '''with''' my friends.}} # [[with]], [[by]] {{gloss|using as an instrument; by means of}} #: {{ux|de|Ich schreibe '''mit''' einem Bleistift.|I'm writing with a pencil.}} #: {{ux|de|Ich fahre '''mit''' dem Bus.|I'm going '''by''' bus.}} # [[with]] {{gloss|as an accessory to}} # [[with]] {{gloss|having}} # [[at]] {{gloss|with the age of}} # [[with]], [[including]], with ... [[included]] ====Usage notes==== * In older usage, Latin-derived nouns occurred in the ablative case after '''''mit''''', e.g. '''''mit''' dem Corpore'', '''''mit''' dem Nomine''. ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|m.}} {{qualifier|abbreviation}} * {{l|de|m/}} {{qualifier|abbreviation; now very rare}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|ohne}} ===Adverb=== {{head|de|adverb}} # [[among]]; {{non-gloss definition|denotes a belonging of a person or a thing to a group}} #: {{ux|de|Schwarze Sklaven haben die Vereinigten Staaten '''mit''' aufgebaut.|Black slaves helped to build up the United States.}} #: {{ux|de|Hier gibt es '''mit''' das beste Essen in der Stadt.|Here they have some of the best food in town.}} #: {{ux|de|Ich war '''mit''' der erste, der hier war.|I was one of the very first who arrived.}} # [[also]], [[too]] {{gloss|in addition; besides; as well}} # {{lb|de|somewhat|informal}} [[with]] (something), with it #: {{ux|de|Ich brauch nicht unbedingt Majonäse zu den Fritten, aber '''mit''' sind sie natürlich besser.|I don't necessarily need mayonnaise with the chips, but they taste better '''with it''', of course.}} ===Derived terms=== * {{l|de|mittem}} {{qualifier|colloquial contraction with definite article ''[[dem]]''}} * {{l|de|mim}} {{qualifier|colloquial contraction with definite article ''[[dem]]''; not used in standard German}} ===Anagrams=== * {{l|de|Tim}} ---- ==German Low German== ===Preposition=== {{head|nds-de|preposition}} # {{alternative spelling of|nds-de|mid}} ---- ==Hungarian== ===Etymology=== {{affix|hu|mi|-t|t1=what?|pos2=accusative suffix|nocat=y}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{hu-IPA}} * {{audio|hu|Hu-mit.ogg|Audio}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|hu|pronoun form}} # {{inflection of|hu|mi||acc|s}} #: {{ux|hu|'''Mit''' gondolsz?|'''What''' do you think?|inline=1}} # {{lb|hu|colloquial}} [[why]] #: {{ux|hu|'''Mit''' szórakozol velem?|'''Why''' (the hell) are you messing with me?|inline=1}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|hu|nincs mit}} {{cln|hu|three-letter words}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/mit/}} ===Preposition=== {{head|hrx|preposition}} {{tlb|hrx|+ dative}} # [[with]] {{gloss|in the company of; alongside}} #: {{ux|hrx|Komm '''mit''' meer.|Come '''with''' me.}} # [[with]], [[by]] {{gloss|using as an instrument; by means of}} #: {{ux|hrx|Ich schreive '''mit''' em Lappis.|I'm writing '''with''' a pencil.}} #: {{ux|hrx|Meer sin '''mim''' Onnibus komm.|We came '''by''' bus.}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|hrx|ohne}} ====Derived terms==== * ('''''mit''' + dem'') {{l|hrx|mim}} ===External links=== * [http://www.hunsrik.org/Lexi/SearchResult?searchStr=aan Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Middle English== ===Preposition=== {{head|enm|preposition}} # {{alternative spelling of|enm|mid}} ===Adjective=== {{enm-adj}} # {{alternative spelling of|enm|mid}} ---- ==Old Dutch== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|odt|gem-pro|*midi}}. ===Preposition=== {{head|odt|preposition}} # [[with]] ====Related terms==== * {{l|odt|midi}} ====Descendants==== * {{desctree|dum|met}} ====Further reading==== * {{R:ONW|2985}} ---- ==Old High German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|goh|miti}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|goh|gem-pro|*midi}}. Akin to {{cog|ang|mid}}, {{cog|osx|mid}}, {{cog|non|með}}. ===Preposition=== {{head|goh|prepositions}} # [[with]] ====Descendants==== * {{desc|gmh|mite}}, {{l|gmh|mit}} ** {{desc|cim|met}} ** {{desc|de|mit}} ** {{desc|lb|mat}} ** {{desc|wym|myt}} ---- ==Old Saxon== ===Preposition=== {{osx-prep}} # {{alternative form of|osx|mid}} ---- ==Pennsylvania German== ===Etymology=== Compare {{cog|de|mit}}, {{cog|nl|met}}, {{cog|sv|med}}. ===Adverb=== {{head|pdc|adverb}} # [[along]] ===Preposition=== {{head|pdc|preposition}} # [[with]] ---- ==Polish== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|pl|grc|μῦθος|t=myth}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{pl-IPA}} * {{audio|pl|Pl-mit.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{pl-noun|m-in}} # [[myth]] ====Declension==== {{pl-decl-noun |mit|mity |mitu|mitów |mitowi|mitom |mit|mity |mitem|mitami |micie|mitach |micie|mity }} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|pl|mityczny}} ---- ==Serbo-Croatian== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|sh|grc|μῦθος|t=myth}}. ===Noun=== {{sh-noun|g=m|head=mȋt}} # [[myth]] ====Declension==== {{sh-decl-noun |mit|mitovi |mita|mitova |mitu|mitovima |mit|mitove |mite|mitovi |mitu|mitovima |mitom|mitovima }} ---- ==Tocharian B== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|txb|mīt}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|txb|ine-toc-pro|*ḿət(ə)}}, from {{inh|txb|ine-pro|*médʰu||mead}}. See also {{cog|och|-}} {{m|zh|蜜||honey|tr=OC *mit}}, which is possibly a borrowing from Tocharian. ===Noun=== {{head|txb|noun}} # [[honey]] ---- ==Tok Pisin== ===Etymology=== From {{der|tpi|en|meat}}. ===Noun=== {{head|tpi|noun}} # [[flesh]], [[meat]] #* {{tpi-cite-bible|Gen|2|23|Man i lukim meri na em i tok olsem, “Em nau. Em i poroman tru bilong mi. Bun bilong em i kamap long bun bilong mi, na '''mit''' bilong em i kamap long '''mit''' bilong mi. God i wokim em long bun bilong mi, olsem na bai mi kolim em ‘meri.’ ”}} {{LDL|tpi}} ---- ==Volapük== ===Noun=== {{vo-noun}} # [[meat]] ====Declension==== {{vo-decl-noun}} ====Derived terms==== {{rel-top3|Terms derived from ''mit'' "meat"}} * {{l|vo|bubamit}} * {{l|vo|jipamit}} * {{l|vo|stägamit}} {{rel-bottom}} ====See also==== * {{l|vo|möt}} ( = [[de]]: [[Mett]]) [[Category:vo:Meats]]
